conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to an isometric-style cutaway model.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D extrusion and perspective. Wall thickness and geometry are clearly defined.

geometric_accuracy.notes: High fidelity to the original layout. All rooms (Bed-1, Bed-2, Utility, Kitchen) are present and correctly positioned.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture and fixtures correctly located; bathroom and kitchen placements match the 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Lighting and structure are very clear; points deducted for 3D text labels superimposed on the floor mesh (E6).

detected_errors.description: Text labels from the 2D plan are rendered as textures on the 3D floor, causing visual clutter.

summary: A highly accurate 3D transformation that maintains exceptional geometric fidelity to the original floor plan, slightly marred by text labels on the floor surface.
